revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Route Victoire |image = [[File:Victory Road.png|thumb]] |caption = Une carte de la Route Victoire. |tokens = 2 000 |location = On Route 23. }} La '''Route Victoire''' est un [[Dungeons/fr|donjon]] de [[Kanto/fr|Kanto]]. Il est initialement composé de 25 cases arrangées en 5x5, comprenant 5 coffres, 13 rencontres hors boss et une case de Combat de Boss. Les rencontres sauvages ont 24 595 PV. == Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages === {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon sauvages !! colspan=2|Dresseurs |- ! Rencontre !! Dresseur !! Équipe Pokémon |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Nosferapti || [[File:Cooltrainer_(female).png|40px]] Topdresseuse Naomi || [[File:Persian.png|40px]] Persian, [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta, [[File:Rapidash.png|40px]] Galopa,
[[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Goupix, [[File:Ninetales.png|40px]] Feunard |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Nosferalto || [[File:Cooltrainer_(male).png|40px]] Topdresseur Enzo|| [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac, [[File:Ivysaur.png|40px]] Herbizarre, [[File:Wartortle.png|40px]] Carabaffe,
[[File:Charmeleon.png|40px]] Reptincel, [[File:Charizard.png|40px]] Dracaufeu |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Racaillou|| [[File:Black_Belt.png|40px]] Karatéka Daisuke || [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machopeur, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machoc, [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machopeur |- | [[File:Arbok.png|40px]] Arbok || [[File:Juggler.png|40px]] Jongleur Nelson || [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Soporifik, [[File:Hypno.png|40px]] Hypnomade, [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra,
[[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra |- | [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sablaireau|| [[File:Tamer.png|40px]] Dompteur Vincent || [[File:Persian.png|40px]] Persian, [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Akwakwak |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Primeape.png|40px]] Colossinge ||[[File:Juggler.png|40px]] Juggler JB || [[File:Mr. Mime.png|40px]] M. Mime |- | [[File:Cooltrainer_(male).png|40px]] Topdresseur Georges || [[File:Exeggutor.png|40px]] Noadkoko, [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sablaireau, [[File:Cloyster.png|40px]] Crustabri,

61 488 |} ==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 39.05% || 37.97% || 33.33% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 39.05% || 37.97% || 33.33% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 5.21% || 5.54% || 6.93% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 5.21% || 5.54% || 6.93% |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 5.21% || 5.54% || 6.93% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 5.21% || 5.54% || 6.93% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.22% |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.22% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || 2 || 0.01% || 0.12% || 0.59% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.06% || 0.29% |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.06% || 0.29% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.84% || 37.84% || 37.84% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.84% || 37.84% || 37.84% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 6.05% || 6.05% || 6.05% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 6.05% || 6.05% || 6.05% |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 6.05% || 6.05% || 6.05% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 6.05% || 6.05% || 6.05% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || 2 || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
